name: Crystal Relife
description:
Save the distant future world.

Fight with energots, collect their energy crystals to power your shield blades

(be patient, give web version couple of minutes to load)

Controls:

Left mouse button - Attack

Right mouse button - Look

WASD + Shift - Move

Caps - Dash

Space - Jump

R - Recharge energy with crystal

G - Upgrade menu

Made with Godot Engine for Go Godot Jam 2

Credits:

Programming: Capt. Theo

3D art: OlyLyl

Other credits: https://gist.github.com/capttheo/6645c04d5af4812eafabe8ccf332b139#file-credits-t...
